Class AbstractGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.AbstractGame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cycling, Running, Swimming

    public abstract class AbstractGame
extends java.lang.Object

    AbstractGame

    Game abstract class provides general behavior and some subclasses to achieve their abstract method
    Version:
    jdk1.8
    Author:
    Bohang Lin s3651013

        public abstract double compete()
        the method of calculating result cause it is different, need the concrete class to achieve that method
        Returns:

      • runGame

        public void runGame()
             throws TooFewAthleteException,
                    NoRefereeException,
                    GameFullException,
                    WrongTypeException
        To start the game, you will call a random score to generate the results of each player Save to map for later query use
        Throws:
        TooFewAthleteException - when trying to run a game, which has less than 4 athletes registered.
        NoRefereeException - when trying run a game which has no official appointed.
        GameFullException - when trying to add an athlete to a game which already has 8 athletes registered
        WrongTypeException - when trying to add an athlete to a wrong type of game e.g assigning a swimmer to a running game. Note, super athletes can participate in all three types of games. This exception is also for attempts of assigning an athlete as an official or assigning an official to a game.

      • saveGameResults

        public void saveGameResults()
        This method is used to save results in "gameResults.txt"
